text: Bowman Gray Stadium is a NASCAR track in Winston-Salem, North Carolina. The Winston-Salem State University Rams football team also plays there, in a stadium in the middle of the track. ==History== The stadium was built in 1937, as part of a project to give workers jobs during the Great Depression. The stadium's first event, held in 1938, was a football game between Wake Forest College and Duke University. Category:NASCAR tracks Category:Sports in North Carolina
title: Bowman Gray Stadium
